name: cpu-hogger
title: POC-App - CPU Hogger
description:
Clicking the 'Block Renderer' button will run a tight loop that will block the renderer thread.
Open multiple of these to test if the views are using different renderer threads

name: poc-app-pubsub-publisher
title: POC App - PubSub/Publisher
description:
Uses OpenFin ChannelAPI to pushlish messages to receivers.
Open multiple receivers -> move your mouse in the publisher -> see the mouse location update in the receivers.

name: poc-app-chart-loader
title: POC App - Chart Loader
description:
Chart Loader publishes random chart data via ChannelAPI -> Chart Renderers will render the charts.
'Open' button opens multiple Chart Renderers.
'Create 1' button only creates on Chart Renderer.
'Start' button start the publishing of random data.
'Stop' button stops publishing.
'Close All' button closes all the Chart Renderers.
